rules.text: “Nazi punks fuck off” no racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, islamophobia, or antisemitism.
Political Toots are welcome under a Content Warning(CW). Political boosts are also allowed because they do not appear in the local feed.
18 years and older please. Adults only means adults can talk freely.
R rated NSFW content must be behind a Content Warning (CW). X rated content on a different server.
Avatars/user images must be PG rated (no nudity or violence).
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No content illegal in the US or EU.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of any mastodon users.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organizations, unless marked as a “parody” in the user handle and bio.
